document.docAuthor: Yamaguchi, Carolina & Lamas, Carlos José Einicker
document.masterDocTitle: A catalogue of the types of Asiloidea (Diptera) in the collection of the Museu de Zoologia da Universidade de São Paulo, Brazil (Part 1: Bombyliidae and Mydidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A catalogue of the types of Asiloidea (Diptera) in the collection of the Museu de Zoologia da Universidade de São Paulo, Brazil (Part 1: Bombyliidae and Mydidae)

bibRefCitation.author: d'Andretta
bibRefCitation.refString: d'Andretta, M. A. V. & Carrera, M. (1952) Resultado de uma expedicao cientifica ao territorio do Acre - Diptera. Papeis Avulsos de Zoologia, 10, 293 - 306.

subSubSection.paragraph:
d’Andretta & Carrera, 1952
: 296-297 (original description); 297 , figure 1 (wing).
Type locality: Rio Iquiri, Acre , Brazil .

Holotype male with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63232 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on red paper: “HOLOTIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp . | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det. 52 [ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: right leg II.

Allotype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63233 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on red paper: “ALOTIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63223 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscription on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp . | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63224 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp . | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: both flagellum, right tarsus of leg I, both leg II and both tarsus of leg III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63225 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: right leg II, left tarsus of leg I and left leg III.

Paratype male with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63226 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; specimen intact with undissected terminalia.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63227 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: right flagellum and left tarsus of leg III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63228 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; both leg III glued at the second label. Missing parts: left wing.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63231 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: left flagellum.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63234 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; both wings partly destroyed; Missing parts: left leg I, II and III, right leg II and right tarsus of leg I and III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63235 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: right leg I, II and III.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63236 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: tip of right wing.

Paratype female with labels: ( 1 ) printed on white paper: “ 63237 ”; ( 2 ) handwritten on white paper: “ Acre | Iquiri | Exp. Dep. Zool. [Expedição do Departamento de Zoologia da Secretária de Agricultura do Estado de São Paulo ] | IX- 951 [ 1951 ] [in vertical position]”; ( 3 ) printed on pink paper: “PARATIPO”; ( 4 ) printed with handwritten inscriptions on white paper: “
Aphoebantus dentei
| n.sp. | M.A.V. d’Andretta et | M. Carrera det.
52
[ 1952 ]”.
Preservation: Pinned; Missing parts: left tarsus of leg III and tip of left wing.
